title: (x) "Special Events" sans, suspected free font - Fishsoup {Angel}
content:
Trying to identify this font so I can create additional graphics for a website I inherited.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211628im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/mystery-font_6338.jpg)

 [‹ (x) "Eagles" script-like sans - Studio Bold {Robert Trogman}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211628/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41511 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Remembering" similar to super thin Chevin - Gravur Condensed {Charles Grant} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211628/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41486 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mtprell
